messages.content: is the westham a football club?

Yes, the West Ham United Football Club is a professional football club based in Stratford, East London, England. They play in the Premier League and have a long-standing rivalry with local club Arsenal. West Ham United was founded in 1895 and has a rich history in the English football league. The club has won the English League Cup once and has been a regular participant in European football.
